_header: Now is time to slay and time to heal
Subjects: sermons, verse in; scripture texts, Engl. trans. of
Bibliographic Ghosts: Oxford, Lincoln College Lat. 52; Worcester, Worcester Cathedral Library F.19.
_description: A tag in the Fasciculus morum — one couplet translating Eccles. 3.3

Bod187.Transcription:
Now ys tyme to sle and tyme to heleNow ys tyme to geddyr and tyme to
                    dele

Bod332.Transcription:
Now is tyme to sle & tyme to heletyme to gedder & tyme to
                    dele

BodLauMis213.Transcription:
Now ys tyme to sle & tyme to heleTyme to god geder
                    & tyme to dele

BodLauMis568.Transcription:
Now is tyme to fle & time to heletime to gadir & time to
                    dele

OxfCCC218.Transcription:
Now ys tyme to sle & tyme to heleTyme to geder & tyme to
                    dele
OxfCCC218.Editions:
Wenzel,  Siegfried. 
             Verses in Sermons: ‘Fasciculus morum’ and Its Middle
                English Poems.
         Cambridge, MA: Medieval Academy of America, 1978: 200.

Now is tyme to sle & tyme to heletyme to gedyr & tyme to
                    dele

EDU82.Transcription:
